languages.text: {n}Внезапно Тервантьяс расплывается в едкой улыбке.{/n} "Хорошо. Я отпущу... один образец. Но ты сам{mf||а} выберешь, какой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Внезапно Тервантьяс расплывается в едкой улыбке.{/n} "Хорошо. Я отпущу... один образец. Но ты сам{mf||а} выберешь, какой".

languages.text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно Тервантьяс расплывается в едкой улыбке.{/n} "Хорошо. Я отпущу... один образец. Но ты сам{mf||а} выберешь, какой".

{n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは辛辣に笑う。{/n}「いいだろう。では…標本を1体解放しよう。どれにするかは、お前次第だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは辛辣に笑う。{/n}「いいだろう。では…標本を1体解放しよう。どれにするかは、お前次第だ」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯露出了尖刻的笑容。{/n}“好吧，那我就释放……一个实验对象。至于要放走哪一个，你自己来选吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯露出了尖刻的笑容。{/n}“好吧，那我就释放……一个实验对象。至于要放走哪一个，你自己来选吧。”

languages.text: {n}Tervantias vous lance un sourire acide.{/n} « Très bien. Je relâcherai... un spécimen. À vous de choisir lequel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias vous lance un sourire acide.{/n} « Très bien. Je relâcherai... un spécimen. À vous de choisir lequel. »

languages.text: {n}Tervantias te dedica una sonrisa ácida.{/n} «De acuerdo. Liberaré... a un espécimen. Te dejaré elegir a cuál».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias te dedica una sonrisa ácida.{/n} «De acuerdo. Liberaré... a un espécimen. Te dejaré elegir a cuál».

languages.text: {n}Tervantias lächelt säuerlich.{/n} "Also gut. Ein Versuchsstück ... kann gehen. Welches das ist, entscheidet Ihr."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias lächelt säuerlich.{/n} "Also gut. Ein Versuchsstück ... kann gehen. Welches das ist, entscheidet Ihr."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias, acı acı gülümsüyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Bir tane numuneyi salacağım. Hangisi olacağını sen seçeceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias smiles acidly.{/n} "Very well. I will release... one specimen. As for which one it will be, the choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias acı acı gülümsüyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Bir tane numuneyi salacağım. Hangisi olacağı konusunda seçim senin."
